Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:06.06]Hello, it's me
[00:11.45]I was wondering if after all these years you'd like to meet
[00:17.50]To go over everything
[00:23.69]They say that time's supposed to heal ya
[00:26.89]But I ain't done much healing
[00:30.15]Hello, can you hear me
[00:35.69]I'm in California dreaming about who we used to be
[00:41.66]When we were younger and free
[00:47.88]I've forgotten how it felt before the world fell at our feet
[00:53.70]There's such a difference between us
[01:00.18]And a million miles
[01:06.90]Hello from the other side
[01:12.79]I must have called a thousand times
[01:17.85]To tell you I'm sorry for everything that I've done
[01:24.08]But when I call you never seem to be home
[01:31.07]Hello from the outside
[01:36.95]At least I can say that I've tried
[01:42.40]To tell you I'm sorry for breaking your heart
[01:48.08]But it don't matter it clearly doesn't tear you apart anymore
[02:01.39]Hello, how are you
[02:06.86]It's so typical of me to talk about myself I'm sorry
[02:13.61]I hope that you're well
[02:19.24]Did you ever make it out of that town where nothing ever happened
[02:25.22]It's no secret that the both of us
[02:31.63]Are running out of time
[02:38.10]Hello from the other side
[02:43.49]I must have called a thousand times
[02:49.33]To tell you I'm sorry for everything that I've done
[02:55.08]But when I call you never seem to be home
[03:01.98]Hello from the outside
[03:08.05]At least I can say that I've tried
[03:13.22]To tell you I'm sorry for breaking your heart
[03:19.25]But it don't matter it clearly doesn't tear you apart anymore
[03:32.23]Anymore
[03:37.69]Anymore
[03:42.44]Another anymore
[03:50.88]Hello from the other side
[03:56.58]I know that I've called a thousand times
[04:02.00]To tell you I'm sorry for everything that I've done
[04:07.93]But when I call you never seem to be home
[04:15.20]Hello from the outside
[04:20.90]At least I can say that I've tried
[04:26.36]To tell you I'm sorry for breaking your heart
[04:32.23]But it don't matter it clearly doesn't tear you apart anymore
